content: in this legal case the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff and granted their request to dissolve a community property the property is a building located in a municipality the court ordered the property to be divided equally among the plaintiff and three coowners the defendants were also ordered to pay the plaintiff €175000 which is onefourth of the propertys value the court determined that the property cannot be divided into separate units the defendants had requested joint allocation of the entire property but their request was rejected the court also dismissed the defendants counterclaim for reimbursement of expenses related to the property the costs of the litigation were divided between the parties the courts decision is final and grants the plaintiffs application and claims while disregarding the defendants exceptions and defenses the court has declared the dissolution of the community property and assigned it to three individuals the defendants are also required to pay the plaintiff €175000 plus interest and cover the costs of the litigation the costs of the courtappointed expert witness will be split between the plaintiff and the defendant the decision was made on august 24 2015 and filed with the clerks office on august 25 2015
